site_name: NAVAJO NATION ZOO AND BOTAN PK

citations.narrative:
There was generalized red rust present on the interior steel paneling of an outdoor enclosure housing a ferruginous hawk.
There was a coating of orange to red rust present on perch fixtures and interior facing metal poles of the outdoor
enclosure of 4 common ravens. The presence of the rust makes it difficult to clean and sanitize surfaces and over time
can lead to structural integrity issues with the metal. The surfaces of the bird housing facilities must be free of rust.
Correct by 25 March 2025.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the facility representatives.
Additional Inspectors:
KATHLEEN GARLAND, Supervisory Animal Care Specialist n

narrative:
3.150(c)(2) 
   
Facilities, general. 
There was generalized red rust present on the interior steel paneling of an outdoor enclosure housing a ferruginous hawk. 
There was a coating of orange to red rust present on perch fixtures and interior facing metal poles of the outdoor 
enclosure of 4 common ravens. The presence of the rust makes it difficult to clean and sanitize surfaces and over time 
can lead to structural integrity issues with the metal. The surfaces of the bird housing facilities must be free of rust.  
 
Correct by 25 March 2025. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the facility representatives. 
 
Additional Inspectors: 
KATHLEEN GARLAND, Supervisory Animal Care Specialist n
